comments: The decimal expansion of Sum_{n>=1} floor(n * tanh(Pi))/10^n is the same as that of 1/81 for the first 268 decimal places [Borwein et al.]Sqrt(999999999999999999) = 9*sqrt(12345679012345679). - _Ryohei Miyadera_, Ken Hirotomi, Hiroyuki Ozaki and Atushi Tanaka, Jan 16 2006Equals Sum_{k = 1 to infinity} (1/2^k)*(1/5^k)*k. - _Eric Desbiaux_, Mar 11 2009
references: J. Borwein, D. Bailey and R. Girgensohn, Experimentation in Mathematics: Computational Paths to Discovery, Peters, Boston, 2004. See Sect. 1.4.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
